verses.verse: (Ps. 135:19, 20) You who fear the LORD, praise Him! All you descendants of Jacob, glorify Him, And fear Him, all you offspring of Israel!
For He has not despised nor abhorred the affliction of the afflicted; Nor has He hidden His face from Him; But (Ps. 31:22; Heb. 5:7) when He cried to Him, He heard.
(Ps. 35:18; 40:9, 10) My praise shall be of You in the great assembly; (Ps. 61:8; Eccl. 5:4) I will pay My vows before those who fear Him.
The poor shall eat and be satisfied; Those who seek Him will praise the LORD. Let your heart live forever!
All the ends of the world Shall remember and turn to the LORD, And all the families of the nations Shall worship before You.
((Ps. 47:7); Obad. 21; (Zech. 14:9); Matt. 6:13) For the kingdom is the LORDâ€™s, And He rules over the nations.
